content:
That's great to hear! Attending the panel on film distribution and marketing will be a fantastic opportunity to learn from industry experts and network with like-minded professionals. You've taken the right steps by researching the panelists and preparing questions, which will show your interest and engagement.

Remember to be open-minded, take notes, and ask thoughtful questions during the Q&A session. This will not only help you gain valuable insights but also demonstrate your enthusiasm and willingness to learn.

Networking is a crucial aspect of any industry event, so be sure to introduce yourself to the panelists, moderators, and other attendees. Exchange contact information, discuss the topics covered, and explore potential collaboration opportunities.

After the panel, take some time to reflect on what you've learned and how you can apply it to your own projects or career goals. Follow up with the panelists and other attendees to continue the conversation and build relationships.

Most importantly, enjoy the experience and be yourself! The film industry is all about collaboration, creativity, and passion, so don't be afraid to share your own ideas and perspectives.

Have a fantastic time at the panel, and I hope you make some valuable connections and takeaways!
